name: Upon This Charge
description:
Use your strategic brilliance to overwhelm the enemy.

Entry for Haxe Winter Jam 2023 - https://itch.io/jam/haxejam-2023-winter-jam/

Full source available in the zip. Licensed under GPL3. I'll put on git after I do some refactoring, the code is very messy currently.

Notes

Apologies if the game is not performant, it's running a very janky and unoptimised box2d physics configuration.

Additional controls:

WASD will move you orthogonally as well if you find the arrow key polar movement is too awkward. 

r to restart.
